title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

President Donald Trump to sue masters of the universe: Twitter, Facebook and Google for censorship during 2020 election. Case could go to the Supreme Court. Trump was banned from social media because he was so effective bringing attention to the liberal bias. Trump used social media to take his message directly to his audience, the left had to silence him. How can we fight back against this tech monopoly? Callers -- even one not on social media -- are fired up about Trump's fight.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
